song.englishname: Church Medley: We've Come This Far by Faith/I Will Trust in the Lord [L

english.segment1: Verse 1: we've come this far by faith. Leaning on the Lord. Trusting in His holy word. He never fail me yet. Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh. No turning around. We've come this far by faith
english.segment3: I will trust in the Lord (x3). Till I die. I will trust in the Lord (x3). Till I die. I'm gonna stay on the battle field (x3). Till I die. I'm gonna stay on the battle field (x3). Till I die. I'm gonna treat everybody right (x3). Till I die. I'm gonna treat everybody right (x3). Till I die
